resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105860</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105860</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206935</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Castolon: A Meeting Place of Two Cultures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castolon: Ein Treffpunkt von zwei Kulturen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castolon : Un endroit de réunion de deux 
cultures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castolon: Um lugar de reunião de duas 
culturas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castolon: Un punto d'incontro di due 
colture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Castolon: Ένας χώρος συνάντησης δύο 
πολιτισμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Castolon: Un lugar de reunión de dos 
culturas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site depicts a small trading and farming community in far southwest Texas, near the border with Mexico (in the southwest corner of today's Big Bend National Park). Castolon was a farming, ranching, and storekeeping partnership at Camp Santa Helena, established after the end of the Mexican Revolution (1920).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site stellt einen kleinen handelnden und 
Bauernverband im weiten Südwesten Texas, nahe dem Rand mit Mexiko 
bildlich dar (in der Südwestecke heutige grosse Schlaufe des 
Nationalparks). Castolon war ein Bewirtschaften und ranching und
storekeeping Teilhaberschaft am Lager Sankt Helena, hergestellt nach 
dem Ende der mexikanischen Umdrehung (1920).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site dépeint une petite communauté 
d'exploitation agricole marchande et dans le sud-ouest lointain le 
Texas, près du cadre avec le Mexique (dans le coin de sud-ouest du 
parc national de grande courbure d'aujourd'hui). Castolon était
un affermage, ranching, et association storekeeping au camp Santa 
Helena, établi après la fin de la révolution mexicaine (1920).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local descreve uma comunidade negociando e 
cultivando pequena no sudoeste distante Texas, perto da beira com 
México (no canto do sudoeste do parque nacional da curvatura grande 
de hoje). Castolon era cultivar, ranching, e parceria 
storekeeping no acampamento Santa Helena, estabelecido após o fim da 
volta mexicana (1920).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo descrive una piccola comune agricola 
commerciale e nel sud-ovest lontano il Texas, vicino al bordo con il 
Messico (nel angolo di sud-ovest del parco nazionale dell'odierna 
curvatura grande). Castolon era un'agricoltura, ranching ed 
associazione storekeeping all'accampamento Santa Helena, stabilito 
dopo l'estremità della Revolution messicana (1920).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή απεικονίζει μια μικρή εμπορική και 
καλλιεργώντας κοινότητα μακριά νοτιοδυτικό Τέξας, κοντά στα 
σύνορα με το Μεξικό (νοτιοδυτική γωνία του σημερινού μεγάλου 
εθνικού πάρκου κάμψεων). Το Castolon ήταν μια 
καλλιέργεια, διευθύνοντας ένα αγρόκτημα, και μια storekeeping 
συνεργασία στο στρατόπεδο Santa Helena, που καθιερώθηκε μετά
από το τέλος της μεξικάνικης επανάστασης (1920).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio representa a comunidad que negocia y 
agrícola pequeña en el sudoeste lejano Tejas, cerca de la frontera 
con México (en la esquina del sudoeste del parque nacional de la 
curva grande de hoy). Castolon era el cultivar, ranching, y 
sociedad storekeeping en el campo Santa Helena, establecido después 
del final de la revolución mexicana (1920).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206935</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105860</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/castolon-a-meeting-place-of-two-cultures</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
